column3: Latest;Banteay:------ According to the Immigration Department’s Facebook page  that on January 27
column6: police at  Poipet international border gate began handing out free face masks around the checkpoint to all citizens and visitors.------The mass distribution is aimed at helping to prevent the respiratory illness (CORONA)
column7: which is spreading in several countries around the world.------An expected 15
column9: 000 masks per day are expected to be distributed free of charge thanks to the Health Ministry’s. At least 1
column11: 000 are believed to be given away across the country in the next month.
